channel.title: Bergen on EICP-LAB
channel.description: Recent content in Bergen on EICP-LAB

item.title: EAERE 2025 Annual Conference
item.description: PhD candidate Zhenhuan Yang was invited to present his co-authored research with Professor Yangsiyu Lu, titled “Raining on Bond: The Impact of Extreme Rain on Local Financing Costs,” at the EAERE 2025 Annual Conference, held in Bergen, Norway from June 16 to 19.
